name: AO Spine Subaxial Cervical Spine injury Classification

attributes.name: Compression
attributes.description: A0- no injury or an isolated injury such as a lamina or spinous process fracture A1 wedge, no post wall A2 split, both endplates A3 partial burst-post wall + 1 endplate A4 burst - post wall + both endplates

values.name: A0
values.description: no injury or an isolated injury (lamina or spinous process fracture)

attributes.name: Tension band injury
attributes.description: B1- transosseous B2- Post tension band (hyperflexion) B3- Anterior tension band (hyperextension)

attributes.name: Facet injury
attributes.description: F1 nondisplaced, less than 1cm height, < 40% lateral mass F2 displaced, > 40% LM F3 floating LM (pedicolaminar) F4 subluxed, perched, dislocated

values.name: F1
values.description: nondisplaced, less than 1cm height, <40% lateral mass

attributes.name: Translation injury
attributes.description: In any axis-displacement or translation of one vertebral body relative to another in any direction

values.name: C
values.description: displacement or translation of one vertebral body relative to another in any direction

attributes.description: M1 unclear integrity of PLC M2 Significant disc herniation M3 bone disease with ankylosis: Ank Spond, DISH M4 Vertebral artery injury
